    • convertGenToSimpleProofSteps

      public static ProofStepStmt[] convertGenToSimpleProofSteps(GenProofStepStmt[] genSteps)
      This function converts the array of generalized steps into array of simple proof steps. Be sure that every general step is actually a simple one.
      Parameters:
      genSteps - steps in generalized form
      Returns:
      simplified steps
